Name: acknowledgement
Definition: An acknowledgement of teams or individuals who have helped with the data set

Name: agency
Definition: The organization through which data collection and processing were conducted (e.g. reads 'DFO' then the organization acronym)

Name: anchor_drop_time
Definition: The date and time (format YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss UTC) at which the anchor was dropped

Name: anchor_release_time
Definition: The date and time (format YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss UTC) at which the anchor was released

Name: anchor_type
Definition: The type and weight of anchor used

Name: comment
Definition: A comment on the data set, processing or otherwise

Name: country
Definition: The country of the agency

Name: country_institute_code
Definition: The code number for the institute found at https://www.nodc.noaa.gov/General/NODC-Archive/institutionlist.txt (e.g. IOS has code 1823)

Name: cruise_description
Definition: A description of the recovery and deployment missions

Name: cut_lead_ensembles
Definition: The number of leading ensembles to cut from the dataset

Name: cut_trail_ensembles
Definition: The number of trailing ensembles to cut from the dataset

Name: deployment_cruise_number
Definition: The number of the deployment cruise

Name: deployment_number
Definition: The deployment number (used to follow a lettering scheme)

Name: history
Definition: The history of the processing and data set

Name: instrument_depth
Definition: Depth of the instrument in meters

Name: instrument_subtype
Definition: The instrument subtype (e.g. Workhorse, Broadband, Sentinel V)

Name: latitude
Definition: Latitude of mooring

Name: longitude
Definition: Longitude of mooring

Name: magnetic_variation
Definition: The average magnetic variation of the timeseries (e.g. obtained from https://www.geomag.nrcan.gc.ca/calc/mdcal-en.php)

Name: platform
Definition: The platform/ship name

Name: project
Definition: The project under which the data were collected

Name: publisher_email
Definition: The email of the data shop which published and processed this data set

Name: recovery_lat
Definition: If mooring was significantly displaced by a vessel strike, provide the latitude at the time of recovery

Name: recovery_lon
Definition: If mooring was significantly displaced by a vessel strike, provide the longitude at the time of recovery

Name: return_cruise_number
Definition: The number of the return cruise

Name: scientist
Definition: The chief scientist of the project (last name first initial)

Name: sea_code
Definition: The NODC code corresponding to the sea the station is in from NOAA at https://www.nodc.noaa.gov/General/NODC-Archive/seanamelist.txt (e.g. Northeast Pacific Ocean has code 57A)

Name: sea_name
Definition: From the list of sea names provided by NOAA at https://www.nodc.noaa.gov/General/NODC-Archive/seanamelist.txt

Name: segment_end_indices
Definition: End index or indices of the dataset starting at 1. If multiple due to mooring strikes, format value as "index1,index2,...,indexN"

Name: segment_start_indices
Definition: Start index or indices of the dataset starting at 1. If multiple due to mooring strikes, format value as "index1,index2,...,indexN"

Name: serial_number
Definition: The serial number of the instrument

Name: station
Definition: The station name for the mooring (e.g., A1)

Name: water_depth
Definition: Water depth in meters
